THE J. G. WHITE ENGINEERING CORPORATION ENGINEERS AND CONSTRUCTORS 8 O BROAD STREET NEW YORK 4, N. Y.
FIELD OFFICE TAIPEI, TAIWAN. P. O. BOX NO. 23 TELEGRAPHIC ADDRESS WHITENGECO, TAIPEI.
TELEGRAPHIC ADDRESS WHITENGECO, NEW YORK
Mr. H. T. Potter P/SP - AID Taipei, Taiwan
April 25, 1962 File Ref. MSA-33.4
Subject: Excess Equipment Project No. 84-99-471
Dear Mr. Potter:
Attached hereto is a copy of a letter to Captain Bent, Disposal Officer at Tainan Air Base.
By a copy of this same letter and a covering letter requesting concurrence from CUSA, Second Division, it is requested that covering Purchase Order be issued for these three items, which were picked up on 24 April, at the same time that a pick-up was made of four 2 wheel trailers and one dolly-converter, for which the 1149 forms are hereto attached.
140 112 213 82
For record purpose, allocation was as follows :
Trailers, each 3
KIHB
Trailers, each 1
THB
Demounter, Tire, each 1
KIHB
*Cleaner, Steam, each 1
THB
*Note - This Steam cleaner is to be jointly used by THB and PWB.
Very truly yours, THE J. G. WHITE ENGINEERING CORPORATION
51.4. 28
08330
V.C.
S G.
2
CUSA
